text: Group E of the 2014 FIFA World Cup had the following teams Switzerland, Ecuador, France, and Honduras. The first game was on 15 June and the last was on 25 June 2014. ==Standings== *France advanced to play Nigeria (runner-up of Group F) in the round of 16. *Switzerland advanced to play Argentina (winner of Group F) in the round of 16. ==Games== ===Switzerland vs Ecuador=== {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" GK 1 Diego Benaglio RB 2 Stephan Lichtsteiner CB 20 Johan
